column5: 600 sq. ft. Italian studio. Private entrance, off street parking. Quite neighborhood, close to all the local attractions. 10 minutes to A&M. Private luxury suite for 2 to 6 guests. Beautifully appointed. 2 Queen beds with great mattresses and 500 thread count fine linens. Hide a bed for extra guests. Living room area with comfortable furniture and a TV. Private bath with large walk in shower. Use of beautiful out door area. Beautifully landscaped. Great for coffee, cocktails or dinner.
